document.full_text: clay hunt had battled depression and post-traumatic stress disorder in the year since he left the marines, but volunteering with team rubicon and veterans organizations like iraq and afghanistan veterans of america seemed to have given him a new sense of purpose.
document.title: at war: veteran loses battle with depression after helping others with their own
lines_and_colors: clay hunt had battled depression and post-traumatic stress disorder in the year since he left the marines, but volunteering with team rubicon and veterans organizations like iraq and afghanistan veterans of america seemed to have given him a new sense of purpose.
